name: RAMPRASAD SHIVCHANDRAI RUIA CHARITABLE TRUST
briefDescription: THE ORGANIZATION HAS STOOD PROMINENT & PRE-EMINENT IN ITS PHILANTHROPICAL NOTIONS BEST TO SUBSERVE THE SOCIETY. IT HAS VOLUNTEERED MANY NUMBER OF MEDICAL CAMPS WORKED A LOT TOWARDS SUPPORTING THE CAUSE OF EYE OPERATIONS E.G. CATARACT SURGERIES. THE ORGANIZATION EXTENDS A HUGE SUPPORT TO ORPHANS AND HAS BEEN SET UP WITH ONE OF ITS INITIATIVES TO SUPPORT EDUCATION AND HEALTH CARE OF ORPHANS.
